attributes.action: Support for adults trying to get higher education
attributes.additional_details: There is currently no support structure for ADULTS without level 3 qualifications who are attending part time courses and on JSA . Jobcentre plus enforces people to quit college if a menial job becomes available . completion of college and further education would improve peoples chances of long term employment more than being forced into dead end positions. this would also help the long term unemployed get education to improve employablity
